titles.title: Public Housing Dispute Reform Act
To amend section 18 of the United States Housing Act of 1937 to improve the program providing for demolition and disposition of public housing.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Banking, Finance + Urban Affrs.

committee.name: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

term.name: Department of Housing and Urban Development

bill.summary: 10/5/1994--Introduced. Public Housing Disposition Reform Act - Amends the United States Housing Act of 1937 to revise provisions regarding the demolition and disposition of public housing, including: (1) conditions for waiver of the "one-for-one" replacement rule; and (2) tenant consultation and relocation assistance.
